about_the_game:
Get in the spirit of heisting with this new winter themed Tailor Pack. The Winter Ghosts Tailor Pack will let you heist in style and blend into the season perfectly. Suitable for both winter heisting and a drink before the fire with your crew, there’s something for everyone.

Masks

We have to remind you that winter is not only presents and fireworks. The cold can be unforgiving for the unwary.

  • PermaFrost
  • Kitsune Kari
  • Deer of Winters Past
  • Leshy

Suits

Two new winter themed suits in 4 varieties each, for a total of 8 new outfits for you to choose from. The Dogsled master provides ample heat for any winter excursions. While the Dead of Winter outfits let you look stylish without freezing your shooting arm off.

Dogsled Master
  • Dogsled Master Ebony
  • Dogsled Master Ivory
  • Dogsled Master Classic
  • Dogsled Master Marine

Dead of Winter
  • Dead of Winter Ice
  • Dead of Winter Orange
  • Dead of Winter Snow
  • Dead of Winter Solid

Weapon Colors

These 4 new weapon colors will get your guns nice and shiny for the holiday season, gift the police with expertly wrapped bullets promptly and in style!
  • Valkyrie’s Glow
  • Gnarled Embrace
  • Redberry Black
  • Cold Front

Weapon Charms

If we haven’t put you in the holiday spirit yet, then this will likely do the job, 4 wonderfully holiday themed charms to give your enemies something beautiful to look at in their last moments.
  • Bliss
  • Snowbrick
  • Old Man Winter
  • Cold Edge
